dsutils.misc



struct Utmp;
A more human structure for Utmp A utmp struct is an entry in UTMP_FILE and represent a connection from an user.

struct UtmpC;
Copy of the C structure you can found in utmp.h Used to retrieve the structures in /var/run/utmp

union UnionUtmp;
This is for transform the raw data in /var/run/utmp into a UtmpC struct.

char[] intarrToCharr(int[] arr);
Convert a int array to a char array

Params:
int[] arr an array of int Returns : an array of char

SysTime bootTime();
Return the last boot's time.

Returns:
a Systime.
